constituent: snapshot, finger, fingers, utmost, sun, day, take, ear, crotch
heisigStory: Finger . . . utmost. This character is used for taking photographs. Note how, conveniently, the element for "take" is included in it.
koohiiStory1: Take the utmost care that you don´t have your finger in the way when you take a snapshot.
koohiiStory2: When I learned photography from my dad as a little girl, he explained the basics to me: "when you take a snapshot, be careful not to put your fingers before the lens, and don´t look towards the sun (this was in the days that photographs would be spoiled by direct sunlight).
myStory: chụp ảnh. tay quá xa khi để chụp ảnh.
